 beyond simplified API

ple

GE=
T /tasks/123/activity
GET /tasks/123/events/today

ce?timestamp=3D4573984579348573

you don't

 part of debate about caching, persistence

 should *all* come down to URI's. The

he confusion when we think

reate an API that
